text: Tara balala, ‘se yadi curi kare thake tabe tara sahodara'o to age curi karechila [1].’ Kintu i'usupha prakrta byapara nijera mane gopana rakhalena ebam tadera kache prakasa karalena na; tini (mane mane) balalena, ‘tomadera abastha to hinatara ebam tomara ya balacha se sambandhe allahi adhika abagata [2].’
